channel.description: Recent content in datawrapper on A blog to teststore my maps

item.title: Mapping with Datawrapper
item.description: The map below is an example of an interactive map made with datawrapper. It shows the evolution of a number of Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) in the EU. It is embedded here by means of a responsive iframe from the Datawrapper platform You can also embed images. See [here (fig:Di6Px)] for an static image of the above map:
